title: Understanding Proportions
text: To determine if the proportion of apples is greater than bananas, compare the fraction of apples to the total number of fruits with the fraction of bananas to the total number of fruits.

title: Calculate Proportion of Apples
text: If there are $$10$$ apples, $$5$$ bananas, and $$5$$ oranges, what is the proportion of apples?

title: Calculate Proportion of Bananas
text: If there are $$10$$ apples, $$5$$ bananas, and $$5$$ oranges, what is the proportion of bananas?

title: Compare Proportions
text: Now that you have the proportions, compare them to see which is greater.

title: Simplify the Fractions
text: Simplify the fractions $$\frac{10}{20}$$ and $$\frac{5}{20}$$ to make comparison easier.

title: Final Comparison
text: $$\frac{1}{2}$$ is greater than $$\frac{1}{4}$$, so the proportion of apples is greater than the proportion of bananas.
